flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It uses a special kind of martial
arts involving all its limbs.
Its fire never goes out.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
Its crown of fire is indicative of
its fiery nature. It is beaten by
none in terms of quickness.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
It uses unique fighting moves with
fire on its hands and feet. It will
take on any opponent.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
It tosses its enemies around with
agility. It uses all its limbs to
fight in its own unique style.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
It tosses its enemies around with
agility. It uses all its limbs to
fight in its own unique style.

flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
A tall, hardy Pokémon with a dazzling appearance. It shrouds
itself in flame and battles as if engaged in dance—truly a sight
to behold.
